traits.Keen Smell: The bear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.Multiattack: The bear makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d4 + 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d4 + 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.
